Title: 3. Korea Travel Fair 2025
Description: 16th-18th May   If you’re like most Singaporeans, then Korea is definitely on your travel list, in which case you should be making your way down to the Korea Travel Fair 2025 . The event features over 20 exhibitors, including tourism boards from Jeju, Busan, Gyeongsangnam-do, and Jeollanam-do, and major travel agencies offering special deals and free gifts upon booking.  Enjoy fun activities like quizzes, DIY crafts, games, and workshops by K-beauty and fashion brands INNISFREE and JUNGSAEMMOOL, covering skincare, makeup, and styling. Participate in the Passport Challenge to win a blind box and daily lucky draws for prizes, including flights to Korea. You won’t want to miss the opening ceremony on 17th May where a performance by K-drama OST singer PUNCH awaits. It’s the perfect chance to immerse yourself in K-Culture with workshops, food tastings, and performances. Admission: Free Venue: Plaza Singapura Dates: 16th-18th May Time: 10.30am-9pm Find out more about the Korea Travel Fair 2025 .
